title: Motorola reportedly more than doubled smartphone sales in United States during 2021
content:
Motorola is immensely popular in Latin America and some other regions, but the company has struggled to maintain a decent marketshare in the United States, where competitors like Samsung and Apple dominate smartphone sales. However, if a new report is accurate, Motorola might have sold enough smartphones last year to reach third place in ‘Murica.

The post Motorola reportedly more than doubled smartphone sales in United States during 2021 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola reportedly became the third-place smartphone brand in the United States last year, thanks to LG leaving the market.
